short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension brings QOL updates to Avistaz.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Brings many QOL features to Avistaz. Clearer seeding requirements. More Transparency.
- Seeding requirements are calculated on the torrent page
- Seeding hours are applied on the history tab
- Ratio is colored accordingly. 
This is in no way affiliated with Avistaz. Use at your own risk.
